posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: Assassin9581
Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:26076273
Reason:Raceism
Length of Ban/Date and time of Unban:Permenate 
What server were you playing?:TTT
Who banned you?:BoomShaka
Why should we unban you?: First off i wasn't calling anyone a N word i just said it and i know thats still bannable and im not asking for a full unban right now I just dont think that it should be permenate. I really like this server and I feel that i shouldn't have a perma ban and that its just a little crazy that i have a perma ban. Im not asking for a unban just like a month ban or 2 weeks.
Lowering down to 2 weeks, seeing it is your first offense but read the rules next time.
